channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large hole in road, 27th April
item.description:
Pot hole has been here for weeks and is now growing by the day. Quite deep and ragged.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Birdlip
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stone chippings covering pavement, 27th April
item.description:
Stone chippings have been flung up from the road surface after resurfacing and potholes forming. These are covering the pavement surface on the south side of the A40. This makes it hard to walk along and potentially dangerous for wheeled transport such as scooters, bikes and will be bad for pushchairs, wheelchairs etc as well.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 382 Gloucester Road, Saint Marks
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely deep and damaging series of potholes, 26th April
item.description:
Potholes over 10cm deep, in a series of other smaller, but still damaging potholes. Urgent repair needed. Damaging to vehicles, possibly fatal to motorcyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes together, 26th April
item.description:
Making one large pothole that everyone avoids. Cyclist find this impossible to cycle on. Very dangerous. What are you thinking leaving this like this?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 85 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsed Manhole Cover, 26th April
item.description:
There has been a hole in the pavement in Pittville Street for many weeks and there was a barrier around it but Cheltenham BID Ambassadors are continually picking them up, putting them back whilst there is no sign of the problem being rectified. But it now appears that a local business has acquired one of the barriers to help them reserve a parking spot. Please help!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 9 Winchcombe Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very noisy manhole cover/pothole, 26th April
item.description:
This manhole cover on London Road has been replaced every year /18 months- never properly. It is really loud as cars drive over it. At night time I have to keep my windows shut as it keeps me awake

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 294 London Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped on green, 26th April
item.description:
Lots of rubbish dumped on the green in the corner which overlooks Aston Grove. Also wooden pallets there too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Aston Grove, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large deep pothole, 26th April
item.description:
From Churchdown towards Hucclecote just before the speed ramp there is a large pothole on the left hand side.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 57 Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sub-standard road side water drainage, 26th April
item.description:
On this section of the road there is a permanent water flow putting the road users life at risk. During the recent winter a major multi vehicle accident happened. The original road manufacturers did not drain the soil and the streams surrounding the road so there is a permanent stream running down the road. Urgent water drainage work needs to be done!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): London Road, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly repaired pot holes A40, 26th April
item.description:
Recently somebody was contracted to repair the potholes on this joint on A40 from public money and the repair poorly, under standard for an A road, there is still road surface level difference and you can lose control of your vehicle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Shipton Cross Rds Cottage A40, Shipton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain holes, 26th April
item.description:
On this section of the road as you go towards Seven springs roundabout on the Lefts side there are two blocked drain holes 1st one exactly in the curve and the 2nd one as you go uphill, These were filled up with tarmac and now there is huge flooding when raining so you can loose control of your vehicle putting road user's life at risk.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Oxford Cottages A436, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Failed repair, 26th April
item.description:
The repair lasted less than 2 months. A series of potholes along the road on both sides
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
